definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Presents the application of them in engineering.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了連通器和混水器在工程中的應用。

sentences.english: To confirm draught on the stormy waves, a specific communicating vessel is designed, by which central surface of waves can be displayed.
sentences.chinese: 爲確定有風浪時船舶的喫水值，設計了特殊的連通器。

sentences.english: The man-made central heating equipment of our home has a simple communicating vessel.
sentences.chinese: 我家自己燒的土暖氣上有一個簡易的連通器。
